R

Room - shendi.game.whoisthespy.room中的类
代表一个游戏的房间.
Room(String, int) - 类 的构造器shendi.game.whoisthespy.room.Room
默认最大人数为6人,满六人自动开始游戏.
RoomEventServlet - shendi.game.whoisthespy.servlet.room中的类
获取指定房间的最近事件.
RoomEventServlet() - 类 的构造器shendi.game.whoisthespy.servlet.room.RoomEventServlet
 
RoomGameState - shendi.game.whoisthespy.game中的接口
 
roomGameState - 类 中的变量shendi.game.whoisthespy.room.Room
房间游戏状态
RoomInfoServlet - shendi.game.whoisthespy.servlet.room中的类

RoomInfoServlet() - 类 的构造器shendi.game.whoisthespy.servlet.room.RoomInfoServlet
 
RoomListServlet - shendi.game.whoisthespy.servlet中的类

RoomListServlet() - 类 的构造器shendi.game.whoisthespy.servlet.RoomListServlet
 
RoomManager - shendi.game.whoisthespy.room中的类
房间管理.
RoomManager() - 类 的构造器shendi.game.whoisthespy.room.RoomManager

rooms - 类 中的静态变量shendi.game.whoisthespy.room.RoomManager
